title: Sum of Two Integers
description:
Given two integers `a` and `b`, print their sum.

Input: two integers separated by space or newline.
Output: single integer equal to a + b.

starter_code.71:
# Python 3 starter
import sys
data = sys.stdin.read().strip().split()
if not data:
    sys.exit(0)
a, b = map(int, data[:2])
print(a + b)
